w:r.w:t: "Dear boy, I have not coerced you, have I?"
"I mean you have volunteered out of the fullness of your faith?"
"Yes, and out of hatred of those who mock and ignore God."
"Excellent. You do not feel manipulated by your elders?"
It was a surprising idea, though
"Of course not. I feel wisely guided by them."
"Yes, I am to meet Charlie at seven-thirty at Excellency Home Furnishings, and we are to drive together to the loaded truck.
He will accompany me in it part of the way to the tunnel.
Then I am on my own.
Something ugly, a disfiguring little twist, crossed the
Without his beard and richly embroid
Stretched out on the rough blue blanket,
of his superior youth, height, and strength,
and of his teacher's fear of him, as one is afraid of a corpse.
seen mischance were not to be there,
could you proceed with the plan?
Could you find the white truck
But why would Charlie not be there?
"Ahmed, I am sure he will be.
He is a brave soldier in our cause, the cause of the true God,
and God never deserts those who wage war on His behalf.
mixed with the distant musical phrases of the City Hall clock.
Everything had a distance to it by now, a receding vibration.
"In a war, if the soldier beside you falls,
even if he is your best friend,
even if he has taught you all you know about soldiering,
or do you march on, into the guns of the enemy?
Rashid lovingly yet warily gazed down upon the boy on the bed.
"I must leave you now, my prized pupil Ahmed.
"Nothing in our studies, I trust, has led you to doubt the perfect and eternal nature of the Book of Books.
If your spirit were to weaken in the
and let the only God speak to you through His last, perfect prophet.
Unbelievers marvel at the power of Islam;
it flows from the voice of Mohammed
a voice from the desert and the marketplace
in all its possibilities and yet
hearkened to a voice from beyond,
were quick to ridicule and revile him.
When the other man was at last gone,
the boy stripped to his underwear
and performed ablution in the tiny bathroom,
where the basin nudged the shoulder of anyone sitting on the toilet.
On the inside of the basin a long brown stain testifies to years of a faucet dripping rusty water.
Ahmed takes the room's one chair to the room's only table,
a bedside table of varnished maple scarred by ash-colored troughs of cigarettes allowed to burn down beyond its top's
Its flexible gilt-edged pages fall open to the fiftieth
hand side where the English tr
They marvel forsooth that one of themselves hath come to them charged with warnings: "This," say the infidels, "is a marvelous thing.
